did.unittitle: Jewish Labor Committee (JLC) - American Federation of Labor (AFL) - Dedication Ceremonies, 28 October 1951 - Excerpts from Report on Plight of Jews in Countries Behind the "Iron Curtain", 8 Pages; "Jewish Life Behind the Iron Curtain and in Western Europe", 10 Pages - Publication, Jewish Labor Committee, "Jewish Labor Fights Communism", 16 Articles, 14 Pages - Letter Re: Publication of the Speech in a JLC Pamphlet, "A Salute to William Green"
